event.description: Cesar Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Daniel Nava homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Odubel Herrera singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Maikel Franco flies out to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Michael Saunders flies out to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Andrew Knapp called out on strikes.
Brock Stassi grounds out, first baseman Joey Votto to pitcher Rookie Davis.
Freddy Galvis walks.
Clay Buchholz strikes out on a foul tip.
Cesar Hernandez singles on a line drive to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Daniel Nava homers (2) on a fly ball to right center field. Cesar Hernandez scores.
Odubel Herrera doubles (2) on a ground ball to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Maikel Franco grounds out, shortstop Zack Cozart to first baseman Joey Votto. Odubel Herrera to 3rd.
Michael Saunders strikes out swinging.
With Andrew Knapp batting, wild pitch by Rookie Davis, Odubel Herrera scores.
Andrew Knapp walks.
Brock Stassi pops out to shortstop Zack Cozart.
Pitching Change: Wandy Peralta replaces Rookie Davis, batting 9th.
Freddy Galvis pops out to second baseman Jose Peraza.
Clay Buchholz strikes out swinging.
Cesar Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Cody Reed replaces Wandy Peralta, batting 9th, replacing Scooter Gennett.
Daniel Nava walks.
Odubel Herrera walks. Daniel Nava to 2nd.
Maikel Franco strikes out on a foul tip.
Michael Saunders grounds into a double play, second baseman Jose Peraza to shortstop Zack Cozart to first baseman Joey Votto. Odubel Herrera out at 2nd.
Andrew Knapp walks.
Brock Stassi walks. Andrew Knapp to 2nd.
With Freddy Galvis batting, Stuart Turner picks off Andrew Knapp at 2nd on throw to Zack Cozart.
Freddy Galvis grounds into a double play, second baseman Jose Peraza to shortstop Zack Cozart to first baseman Joey Votto. Brock Stassi out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Tony Cingrani replaces Cody Reed, batting 9th, replacing Michael Lorenzen.
Tommy Joseph lines out to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Cesar Hernandez grounds out softly, third baseman Eugenio Suarez to first baseman Joey Votto.
Daniel Nava called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Blake Wood replaces Tony Cingrani, batting 9th.
Odubel Herrera strikes out swinging.
Maikel Franco strikes out swinging.
Michael Saunders lines out to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Pitching Change: Drew Storen replaces Blake Wood, batting 9th, replacing Patrick Kivlehan.
Andrew Knapp called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Andres Blanco replaces Edubray Ramos.
Andres Blanco singles on a ground ball to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Freddy Galvis called out on strikes.
Tommy Joseph grounds out sharply, second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto.
Billy Hamilton singles on a line drive to center fielder Odubel Herrera.
Jose Peraza pops out to second baseman Cesar Hernandez.
Joey Votto flies out to right fielder Michael Saunders.
Adam Duvall called out on strikes.
Eugenio Suarez hits a ground-rule double (1) on a line drive .
Scott Schebler grounds out, second baseman Cesar Hernandez to first baseman Brock Stassi. Eugenio Suarez to 3rd.
Zack Cozart out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Odubel Herrera. Eugenio Suarez scores.
Stuart Turner called out on strikes.
Rookie Davis doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Daniel Nava.
Billy Hamilton singles on a pop up to second baseman Cesar Hernandez.
Jose Peraza grounds into a force out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to second baseman Cesar Hernandez. Rookie Davis to 3rd. Billy Hamilton out at 2nd. Jose Peraza to 1st.
Joey Votto grounds into a double play, first baseman Brock Stassi to shortstop Freddy Galvis. Jose Peraza out at 2nd.
Adam Duvall singles on a soft ground ball to right fielder Michael Saunders.
Eugenio Suarez singles on a line drive to left fielder Daniel Nava. Adam Duvall to 3rd.
Scott Schebler walks. Eugenio Suarez to 2nd.
Zack Cozart singles on a line drive to left fielder Daniel Nava. Adam Duvall scores. Eugenio Suarez to 3rd. Scott Schebler to 2nd.
Stuart Turner out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Michael Saunders. Eugenio Suarez scores. Scott Schebler to 3rd. Zack Cozart to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Scooter Gennett replaces Wandy Peralta.
Scooter Gennett grounds out to first baseman Brock Stassi. Scott Schebler scores. Zack Cozart to 3rd.
Billy Hamilton lines out softly to second baseman Cesar Hernandez.
Jose Peraza flies out to right fielder Michael Saunders.
Joey Votto singles on a ground ball to center fielder Odubel Herrera.
Adam Duvall strikes out swinging.
Eugenio Suarez walks. Joey Votto to 2nd.
Scott Schebler pops out to third baseman Maikel Franco in foul territory.
Pitching Change: Adam Morgan replaces Clay Buchholz, batting 7th, replacing first baseman Brock Stassi.
Defensive Substitution: Tommy Joseph replaces pitcher Clay Buchholz, batting 9th, playing first base.
Zack Cozart strikes out swinging.
Stuart Turner grounds out sharply, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman Tommy Joseph.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Michael Lorenzen replaces Cody Reed.
Michael Lorenzen homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Billy Hamilton grounds out, third baseman Maikel Franco to first baseman Tommy Joseph.
Jose Peraza singles on a line drive to center fielder Odubel Herrera.
With Joey Votto batting, Jose Peraza steals (1) 2nd base.
Joey Votto strikes out on a foul tip.
Adam Duvall homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field. Jose Peraza scores.

Scott Schebler grounds out sharply, second baseman Cesar Hernandez to first baseman Tommy Joseph.

Pitching Change: Edubray Ramos replaces Adam Morgan, batting 7th.

Billy Hamilton lines into a force out, left fielder Daniel Nava to third baseman Maikel Franco. Zack Cozart out at 3rd. Patrick Kivlehan to 2nd. Billy Hamilton to 1st.
Jose Peraza grounds out softly, third baseman Maikel Franco to first baseman Tommy Joseph.
